title: Tasty Vepudu Guntur Chicken Curry Recipe
content:
Delicious and juicy chicken stir fry which is also called chicken vepudu. This is super yummy and tastes amazing with some rice and rasam.

This is a spicy chicken dish that tastes fantastic. It is spicy and delicious. This tastes amazing even with some pulao, biryani as well. You can even serve it with some roti or paratha too. But I enjoy it thoroughly with some rasam rice.

 

Vepudu Guntur Chicken Curry

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

 

FOR CHICKEN:

Chicken - 500 grams with bone

Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Coriander Powder - 1 teaspoon

Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Cumin powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam masala powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Lemon Juice - 3 tablespoons

Oil for deep frying

 

FOR MASALA:

Oil - 2 tablespoons

Onion - 1 large sliced

Curry Leaves a handful

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Tomato - 2 chopped

Salt to taste

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Coriander Powder - 1 teaspoon

Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Cumin powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam masala powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Water - 1 cup

 

Instructions

Take chicken in a bowl, add all ingredients except oil and mix well.

Deep fry chicken till golden. Drain and set aside.

Heat little oil in a pan. Add in onion, curry leaves, ginger garlic paste and mix well.

Add tomatoes and mix well.

Add salt, spice powders, water and mix well.

Once the gravy is done. Add chicken and mix well.

Cover and cook till chicken is dry.

Serve it.

recommendations.content:
Kali Mirch Kebab is a very humble recipe, it needs just a handful of ingredients but the taste is spectacular. This pepper kebab is so good.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
